channel.title: Latest alerts from Tanzania Meteorological Agency
channel.description: Latest alerts from Tanzania Meteorological Agency

image.title: Latest alerts from Tanzania Meteorological Agency

item.title: YELLOW ADVISORY: Strong winds and Large waves
item.description: Strong winds and large waves are expected over coastal areas of Dar es salaam, Tanga, Pwani, Lindi and Mtwara regions together with Unguja and Pemba isles. Likelihood of occurrence is MODERATE and expected Impacts are MODERATE. The expected impacts of this phenomenon are widespread of rubbish, falling of leaves and small tree branches, challenge to some of marine activities, scarcity of fish and associated impacts.
item.author: severe@meteo.go.tz (Tanzania Meteorological Agency)

item.title: YELLOW ADVISORY: Strong winds and Large waves
item.description: Strong winds and large waves are expected over southern coast, areas of Lindi and Mtwara regions. Likelihood of occurrence is HIGH and expected Impacts are LOW. The expected impacts of this phenomenon are widespread of rubbish, falling of leaves and small tree branches, challenge to some of marine activities, scarcity of fish and associated impacts.

item.title: YELLOW ADVISORY: HEAVY RAINS
item.description: Heavy rains are expected over some areas of Tanga, Pwani and Dar es salaam regions together with Unguja and Pemba isles. Likelihood of occurrence is MODERATE and expected Impacts are MODERATE. The expected impacts of this phenomenon are widespread long travel delays ,some road closures, more widespread disruption to infrastructure, resources and associated impacts.
item.author: severe@meteo.go.tz (Tanzania Meteorological Agency)
